content.text:
# 1875 Central Cumberland colonial by-election

A by-election was held for the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Central Cumberland on 28 June 1875 because of the resignation of Joseph Wearne.
Dates
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Date
! Event
|-
| 12 June 1875
| Joseph Wearne resigned.
|-
| 15 June 1875
| Writ of election issued by the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly.
|-
| 24 June 1875
| Nominations
|-
| 28 June 1875
| Polling day
|-
| 12 July 1875
| Return of writ
|}
Result
}}
Joseph Wearne rsigned.
